sentences.english: Chan feels that the experience of studying these butterflies has improved his life.
sentences.chinese: 詹家龍覺得研究紫斑蝶讓他的人生更完美。

sentences.english: In case 3, painful tissue necrosis was found on the left heel and later on the right great toe.
sentences.chinese: 例3表現爲足跟部及腳趾痛性網狀紫斑和乾性壞死。

sentences.english: Maolin's Purple Butterfly Valley is where Taiwan's purple crow butterflies spend the winter.
sentences.chinese: 茂林的紫蝶幽谷是臺灣紫斑蝶過冬的地方。

sentences.english: In case 2, painful skin ulceration of the dorsum of the right foot was developed.
sentences.chinese: 例2在腳趾根部出現痛性網狀紫斑及皮膚潰瘍。

sentences.english: I retorted, showing a decided purple witness to refute her.
sentences.chinese: 我回嘴，指着我明擺着的紫斑作爲見證來駁倒她。

sentences.english: Through his research on purple crow butterflies, Chan hoped to raise people's awareness about the need for environmental protection.
sentences.chinese: 詹家龍希望透過研究紫斑蝶來提高人們的環保意識。

sentences.english: Into "purple patches" In the cell membrane.
sentences.chinese: 此種蛋白質分子在細胞膜上聚集成“紫斑”。

sentences.english: Molecules of this proteIn aggregate Into "purple patches" In the cell membrane.
sentences.chinese: 此種蛋白質分子在細胞膜上聚集成“紫斑”。

definition: dark spot or blotch on the skin
cyanosis (blue skin due to lack of oxygen in blood)
